title: Embroidered italic "f"
content:
Anyone got a sujestion as to what font i could use to approximate this?  
Does not have to be exact....  
Thanks....

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [f.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018102215/http:/typophile.com/files/f_4.jpg) | 6.8 KB |
author: planet_embroidery

comments.content: [FF Singer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018102215/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=FF.8652.0.0) is based on a sewing machine's thread, but it's a lot rougher than your sample.

tHANKS but no... i digitize all my own stuff...  
Which are invariably based on ttf fonts.....

FF Singer is absolutely hideous; I can't believe someone made it and I can't believe someone is actually trying to sell it. Yuck.

Ok, back to the topic, which unfortunately I can't help with.

Actually I can help. [Monotype Garamond italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018102215/http:/www.linotype.com/155963/monotypegaramonditalic-font.html).

Edit: hmm...maybe not. I'll hand it back to the experts.
